title: Remote Security Assessment
headline: Evaluate and strengthen your setup remotely.
description: We perform a comprehensive remote security audit of your systems, looking for vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, and weak points.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
sections.paragraph: Many systems appear secure but still expose sensitive data or services online. Misconfigured settings, weak passwords, or outdated software can create invisible vulnerabilities until they're exploited.

sections.heading: What's a Remote Audit?
sections.paragraph: We examine your system, settings, and network configuration through a secure remote session. You receive a full report of risks and actionable fixes.

sections.heading: Included in Every Assessment
items: Firewall, antivirus, and patch status review
Account security and password hygiene checks
Tailored recommendations based on your use case

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: You connect with us using a secure remote tool. We walk you through the process, run non-invasive checks, and deliver your report the same day.
